Body: The list in "A Dictionary of Selected Synonyms in the Principal Indo-European Languages", Carl Darling Buck, 1949, has been used in several comparisons. It has 22 semantic categories of words, like bodyparts, clothing, time etc. AFAIK it includes all the words on the Swadesh list and some 1200 others in addition. The following two collections based this book are online: World Loanword Database and The Intercontinental Dictionary Series. The former has more words and the latter has more languages.
